aboutAlternative.text:
Finding next generations on Java/JavaScript (AJAX) application development.

Specialties: Requirements Gathering, Software Development (Java, JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, etc), Image Processing, Machine Learning, Numeric Computing.

positions.title: Java and JavaScript Developer
positions.description:
Developed a prediction engine (self-learning prediction framework) using decision tree algorithm of machine leaning.

Site: http://www5f.biglobe.ne.jp/~webtest/train/

positions.title: JavaScript Developer
positions.description:
Developed SkyJs (Numerical Computing Expression Language for JavaScript) that makes it possible to easily invoke functions implemented in numerical computing JavaScript Library such as SkyLib, numeric.js.
SkyJs also provides SkyLib (Numerical Computing Library), SkyPlot (Graphic Library), SkyImg (Image Processing Library).

Site: http://www5f.biglobe.ne.jp/~webtest/skyjs/
…
see more

positions.title: Java and JavaScript Developer
positions.description:
Developed Resume Classifier that supports screening candidates to find for strong Java and JavaScript developers.
The classifier classifies candidate's resume into strong, mid-level or poor developer by using Naive Bayes algorithm based on our training data. It also shows what type of developer the candidate is (Web developer, System Analyst, QA Tester and so on).

Site: http://www5f.biglobe.ne.jp/~webtest/resumeclassifier/
…
see more

positions.title: Java Developer

The idea of the tool was accepted by IPA (Information Promotion Agency)'s project called Mitou project designed to help produce world class programmers.
